repository.corpname: M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections & Archives

did.unittitle: Berlin and East Sudbury Stage Company Records

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Berlin and East Sudbury Stage Company

did.abstract: 19th century accounting records for a Vermont stage company.
did.physloc: The materials are located onsite in the department.

bioghist.head: Historical Sketch
bioghist.p: The Berlin and East Sudbury Stage Company was a stage company in Vermont.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains records of income and expenses for the Berlin and East Sudbury Stage Company. The collection also includes "an account of articles sold or carried from Northboro pauper establishment," 1841.

arrangement.head: Arrangement of the Collection
arrangement.p: The collection is unprocessed and is likely disorganized. Individual items may be difficult to find.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted because it is unprocessed. Portions of the collection may contain recent administrative records and/or personally identifiable information. While it is likely that portions of the collection may be viewed, access must be managed by an archivist.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: The researcher assumes full responsibility for conforming with the laws of copyright. Whenever possible, the M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives will provide information about copyright owners and other restrictions, but the legal determination ultimately rests with the researcher. Requests for permission to publish material from this collection should be discussed with the Head of Special Collections and Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows: Identification of specific item, series, box, folder, Berlin and East Sudbury Stage Company Records, 1828-1832. M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives, University Libraries, University at Albany, State University of New York (hereafter referred to as the Berlin and East Sudbury Stage Company Records).

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The collection was purchased from a dealer in 1966.
